Title: China's Khrushchev, go to hell!
Designer: Harbin Decorative Arts Company Red Rebel Group Red Brush (哈尔滨市装潢美术公司红色造反团红画笔)
Publisher: Heilongjiang renmin chubanshe (黑龙江人民出版社)
Notes: "China's Khrushchev" is Liu Shaoqi, the booklet in the bottom left corner is his 1939 publication How to be a good Communist (论共产党员的修养).
Tags: How to be a good Communist
